mapper.insert: insert into tbl_system_jenkins_job_run ( system_jenkins_ID,system_ID, job_Name, root_pom, build_STATUS, build_logs, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, START_DATE,environment_type, LAST_UPDATE_DATE,create_type,job_type,END_DATE,JOB_CONFIGURATION,Goals_options,JOB_RUN_NUMBER,BUILD_PARAMETER) values ( #{systemJenkinsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rootPom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildLogs,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{environmentType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{jobConfiguration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{goalsOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jobRunNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{buildParameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.sql: ID, system_jenkins_ID, system_ID, job_Name, root_pom, Goals_options, build_STATUS, environment_type, build_logs, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, START_DATE,END_DATE,LAST_UPDATE_DATE,create_type,JOB_TYPE,job_Name,JOB_CONFIGURATION,JOB_RUN_NUMBER,BUILD_PARAMETER

ID, system_jenkins_ID, system_ID, job_Name, root_pom, Goals_options, build_STATUS, environment_type, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, START_DATE,END_DATE,LAST_UPDATE_DATE,create_type,JOB_TYPE,job_Name,JOB_CONFIGURATION,JOB_RUN_NUMBER
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_system_jenkins_job_run systejobrun SET
systejobrun.START_DATE = #{startDate},
systejobrun.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
systejobrun.build_STATUS = #{buildStatus} ,systejobrun.LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate},systejobrun.build_logs = #{buildLogs},systejobrun.END_DATE = #{endDate} where systejobrun.ID=#{id}
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run where SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and SYSTEM_JENKINS_ID=#{systemJenkinsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status=1 and create_type=#{createType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and JOB_TYPE=#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and END_DATE is null and date_sub(now(), interval +1 hour)>START_DATE

select
from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run where SYSTEM_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and build_status!=1 and create_type=1 and job_type=1 and status=1 order by END_DATE DESC limit 0,1

select
from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run
where SYSTEM_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and build_status!=1 and create_type=1 and job_type=2 and status=1 order by END_DATE DESC limit 0,1

select
from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run
where SYSTEM_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and build_status!=1 and create_type=2 and job_type=1 and status=1 order by END_DATE DESC limit 0,1

select
from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run
where SYSTEM_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and build_status!=1 and create_type=2 and job_type=2 and status=1 order by END_DATE DESC limit 0,1

select
from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run
where SYSTEM_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status=1 order by ID DESC

SELECT tjrs.build_STATUS buildStatus,
tjrs.END_DATE endDate, tjrs.START_DATE startDate, tjrs.ID id, tjrs.job_name jobName, tjrs.CREATE_TYPE createType, tjrs.environment_type envType FROM tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjrs where tjrs.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tjrs.CREATE_TYPE=#{createType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and tjrs.job_type=1 and tjrs.status=1 and ( tjrs.build_STATUS=2 or tjrs.build_STATUS=3 ) and tjrs.status=1 order by tjrs.END_DATE DESC
select VALUE_CODE,TERM_NAME,VALUE_NAME from tbl_data_dic where TERM_CODE = #{termCode} and VALUE_CODE= #{envType}
select VALUE_CODE,TERM_NAME,VALUE_NAME from tbl_data_dic where TERM_CODE = #{termCode} and status=2

select
from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run
where SYSTEM_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and build_status!=1 and create_type=1 and job_type=2 and status=1 order by END_DATE DESC limit 0,1

select
from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run where job_Name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=1 order by END_DATE DESC

SELECT tjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tjr.END_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.system_id =#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=1 and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 ORDER BY tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tmjr.BUILD_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.system_id =#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=1 and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS in (2,3,5) ORDER BY tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tmjr.BUILD_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID systemModuleId, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.system_id =#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=1 and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS in (2,3,5) ORDER BY tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,50

SELECT tmjr.BUILD_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID systemModuleId, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.system_id =#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=1 and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS in (2,3,5) and tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{systemModuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tjr.END_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.system_id =#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 ORDER BY tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tmjr.BUILD_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.system_id =#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS in (2,3,5) ORDER BY tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tmjr.BUILD_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType, tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID systemModuleId FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.system_id =#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS in (2,3,5) ORDER BY tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,50

SELECT tmjr.BUILD_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType, tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID systemModuleId FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.system_id =#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS in (2,3,5) and tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{systemModuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tjr.END_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.system_id is null and tmjr.status=1 ORDER BY tmjr.id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT tjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tjr.END_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and tmjr.job_name not like '%scheduled' and tmjr.system_id=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=1 and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 ORDER BY tmjr.id DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tmjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and tmjr.job_name not like '%scheduled' and tmjr.system_id=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=1 and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS=1 ORDER BY tmjr.id DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tmjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType, tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID systemModuleId FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where
tmjr.job_name not like '%scheduled' and tmjr.system_id=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=1 and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS=1 ORDER BY tmjr.id DESC LIMIT 0,200

SELECT tjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tjr.END_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.job_name not like '%scheduled' and tmjr.system_id=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 ORDER BY tmjr.id DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tmjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID=#{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.job_name not like '%scheduled' and tmjr.system_id=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS in (1,4) ORDER BY tmjr.id DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT tmjr.build_STATUS buildStatus, tmjr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE endDate, tjr.environment_type environmentType, tmjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID systemModuleId, tmjr.JOB_NAME jobName FROM tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tmjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tjr ON tmjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = tjr.id where tmjr.job_name not like '%scheduled' and tmjr.system_id=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tmjr.JOB_TYPE=#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and tmjr.CREATE_TYPE=1 and tmjr.status=1 and tmjr.BUILD_STATUS in (1,4) ORDER BY tmjr.id DESC LIMIT 0,20
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_system_jenkins_job_run
ID,
system_jenkins_ID,
system_ID,
job_Name,
root_pom,
Goals_options,
build_STATUS,
build_logs,
STATUS,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DATE,
LAST_UPDATE_BY,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{systemJenkinsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rootPom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goalsOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{buildStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{buildLogs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update tbl_system_jenkins_job_run
system_jenkins_ID = #{systemJenkinsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
system_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
job_Name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
root_pom = #{rootPom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Goals_options = #{goalsOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
build_STATUS = #{buildStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
build_logs = #{buildLogs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_system_jenkins_job_run set system_jenkins_ID = #{systemJenkinsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, system_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, job_Name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, root_pom = #{rootPom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Goals_options = #{goalsOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_STATUS = #{buildStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, build_logs = #{buildLogs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tpi.ID,tsi.SYSTEM_NAME systemName,tsjr.SYSTEM_ID,tsjr.ID,tsjr.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE,tsjr.BUILD_STATUS, tsjr.START_DATE,tsjr.END_DATE,tsjr.CREATE_TYPE,tsjr.JOB_NAME from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON tsjr.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info tpi ON tsi.PROJECT_ID=tpi.ID AND tpi.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_project_group tpg ON tpg.PROJECT_ID=tpi.ID AND tpg.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_project_group_user tpgu ON tpgu.PROJECT_GROUP_ID=tpg.ID AND tpgu.STATUS=1 WHERE tsjr.STATUS=1 AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 AND tpgu.USER_ID=#{userId} GROUP BY tsjr.SYSTEM_ID,tsjr.ID ORDER BY tsjr.ID DESC limit 0,10

SELECT a.click_date createDate,ifnull(b.inCount,0) inCount, ifnull(b.successCount,0) successCount,ifnull(b.failCount,0) failCount from ( SELECT curdate() as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 2 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 4 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 6 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 8 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 9 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 10 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 11 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 12 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 13 day) as click_date ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(case when BUILD_STATUS=1 THEN 1 else null END) inCount, count(case when BUILD_STATUS=2 THEN 1 else null END) successCount, count(case when BUILD_STATUS=3 THEN 1 else null END) failCount, DATE_FORMAT(tsjr.START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') startTime from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON tsjr.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 WHERE tsjr.STATUS=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId} AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 group by startTime ) b on a.click_date = b.startTime ORDER BY createDate

SELECT a.click_date createDate,ifnull(b.minuteCount,0) minuteCount from ( SELECT curdate() as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 2 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 4 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 6 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 8 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 9 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 10 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 11 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 12 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 13 day) as click_date ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN END_DATE is not null THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,START_DATE,END_DATE) ELSE null END) minuteCount, DATE_FORMAT(tsjr.START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') startTime from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON tsjr.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 WHERE tsjr.STATUS=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId} AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 group by startTime ) b on a.click_date = b.startTime ORDER BY createDate

SELECT tsjr.ID,tsi.SYSTEM_NAME systemName,tsjr.job_Name jobName,tsjr.create_type createType,tsjr.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE environmentType, tsjr.START_DATE startDate,tsjr.BUILD_STATUS buildStatus from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON tsjr.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 WHERE tsjr.STATUS=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId} AND tsjr.BUILD_STATUS>1 AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 ORDER BY tsjr.START_DATE DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT COUNT(tsjr.ID) inCount from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON tsjr.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 WHERE tsjr.STATUS=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId} AND datediff(now(),tsjr.START_DATE)<=#{day} AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 AND tsjr.BUILD_STATUS <> 1

SELECT BUILD_STATUS,COUNT(BUILD_STATUS) inCount from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON tsjr.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 WHERE tsjr.STATUS=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId} AND datediff(now(),tsjr.START_DATE)<=6 AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 GROUP BY BUILD_STATUS union all select 0,count(*) from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON tsjr.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 WHERE tsjr.STATUS=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId} AND datediff(now(),tsjr.START_DATE)<=6 AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 AND tsjr.BUILD_STATUS <> 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT tsjr.SYSTEM_ID,tsjr.ID,tsjr.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE,tsjr.BUILD_STATUS, tsjr.START_DATE,tsjr.END_DATE from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr WHERE SYSTEM_ID=#{systemId} AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 ORDER BY END_DATE DESC limit 0,1 ) a WHERE a.ID=#{ID}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT tsjr.SYSTEM_ID,tsjr.ID,tsjr.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE,tsjr.BUILD_STATUS, tsjr.START_DATE,tsjr.END_DATE from tbl_system_jenkins_job_run tsjr WHERE job_Name=#{jobName} AND tsjr.JOB_TYPE=1 ORDER BY END_DATE DESC limit 0,1 ) a WHERE a.ID=#{ID}
